## Conference Papers^[The following papers are not peer-reviewed. At most accelerator conferences (such as IPAC) contributions are limited to three pages in length and are meant to complement posters or talks. (There is an option for [light peer review](https://www.ipac26.org/light-peer-review/) but I've never tried it.) Papers often report work in progress, before submission to a journal, or summarize previously published work.]
